table.name: mkdb_elasticfilters
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ethercalc` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `namecrm` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `createdtime` datetime NOT NULL, `spid` varchar(200) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
